mapper.select: SELECT TO_DATE(BUN_DATE,'YY/MM/DD'), TO_DATE(RECEIPT_DATE,'YY/MM/DD'), G_SUCCESS_CODE AS SUCCESS_CODE,P.G_POST_CODE AS POST_CODE, P.TITLE,P.B_USER_CODE FROM G_SUCCESS S LEFT JOIN G_POST P ON S.G_POST_CODE = P.G_POST_CODE WHERE B_USER_CODE = #{B_USER_CODE}

SELECT P.BUN_DATE,P.RECEIPT_DATE, P.G_POST_CODE AS POST_CODE,S.G_SUCCESS_CODE AS SUCCESS_CODE, P.TITLE,P.B_USER_CODE FROM G_SUCCESS S LEFT JOIN G_POST P ON S.G_POST_CODE = P.G_POST_CODE LEFT JOIN G_APPLY A ON A.G_POST_CODE = P.G_POST_CODE WHERE A.B_USER_CODE = #{B_USER_CODE}
